name: stoop-ui
description: UI component library built with stoop
author: Jackson Dolman <mail@dolmios.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser --jsx=automatic --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime && bun build ./src/stoop.theme.ts --outfile ./dist/stoop.theme.js --target browser --jsx=automatic --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime && bunx tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
